TopicTitle: New to forums, not to game, or the physics

Articles.Content: Hey guys, long time lurker. Been playing since Alpha. Never got to another planet (outside of Kerban SOI) until beta. Then I made a station, so forth and so on until I visited every planet, including Eeloo. Mechanical engineering student, however I do research in Additive Manufacturing so I guess I am an engineer, albeit one in training. Anyways, I'm going to try my hand at a return mission from Eve finally (new aero model = feasible takeoff and reorbit from sea level possible?) and probably do the Jool 5. Anyways, hope to make friendships with you guys, rivalries with others. Time to get this thing started!

Welcome! To be fair, we're all new to the updated (more accurate) aerodynamics.

Friend

or

Rivalry

I choose, Friendly Rivalry!

Welcome, jerdrb! Hope we can have a great rivalry I mean time no, frien

Oh, just kill me now.

Welcome to the forums jerdrb!

I too haven't been to Eve since the new areo model has been implemented (I've spent the last few days rebuilding my SSTO's and planes).

Personally I like friends over rivals, but as Kautilya said long ago "an enemy to my enemy is my friend".

All the best.
